# Spell Mantle, Greater (Feat)
## Overview
Your control over contingent and mantled spells you carry is much greater

**Prerequisites:** [[Craft Contingent Spell (Feat)|Craft Contingent Spell]], [[Spell Mantle (Feat)|Spell Mantle]], [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (arcana) 10 ranks, [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (history) 5 ranks.

**Benefit:** You can use a swift action to activate a particular contingent or mantled spell you carry as a spell-like ability, even if the conditions specified for its activation have not been met.

**Normal:** When you create a contingent or mantled spell, you must use a standard action to trigger the effect.

**Source:** Wizards of the Coast web enhancement
